qas.question: What type of accessory company did Beyonce partner with in 2005?
In 2010, Beyonce released Dereon to what country?
Back-to-school shopping was introduced in what year of Beyonce's clothing line?
What did Beyonce's Fashion Diva  feature?
What new idea did Beyonce and her mother launch in 2009?
When did Beyonce partner with C&A to sell fashion in Brazil?
What company did Beyoncé get together with in 2005 to add shoes to her fashions?
What was the name of the game put out by Starwave Mobile in 2008 that featured Beyoncé fashions?
What was the name of the junior fashions launched in 2009 by Beyoncé and her mother?
Who did Beyoncé team up with in 2010 to get her fashions into Brazil?
Sasha Fierce for Deréon fashions were sold at stores that included Macy's and what other store?

context: In 2005, Beyoncé teamed up with <a6_0>House of Brands<a6_0/>, a <a0_0>shoe<a0_0/> company, to produce a range of footwear for House of Deréon. In January 2008, Starwave Mobile launched <a7_0>Beyoncé Fashion Diva<a7_0/>, a "high-style" mobile game with a social networking component, featuring the <a3_0>House of Deréon collection<a3_0/>. In July <a2_0>2009<a2_0/>, Beyoncé and her mother launched a new junior apparel label, <a4_0><a8_0>Sasha Fierce for Deréon<a8_0/><a4_0/>, for back-to-school selling. The collection included sportswear, outerwear, handbags, footwear, eyewear, lingerie and jewelry. It was available at department stores including Macy's and <a10_0>Dillard's<a10_0/>, and specialty stores Jimmy Jazz and Against All Odds. On <a5_0>May 27, 2010<a5_0/>, Beyoncé teamed up with clothing store <a9_0>C&A<a9_0/> to launch Deréon by Beyoncé at their stores in <a1_0>Brazil<a1_0/>. The collection included tailored blazers with padded shoulders, little black dresses, embroidered tops and shirts and bandage dresses.
